page.title: 15Thirsk Racecourse Co. Ltd.
page.content: Four stands, accommodating some 9OOO racegoers tower over the racecourse. The main stand, with a distinctive green trapdoor in its roof for the commentator, features private rooms with balconies.Stands include bars and restaurants. There is the Tote and there are places for over 5O bookies' umbrellas in front of the main stand alone. The racecourse facilities include many up to date features;the stable lads hostel has showers, a television room and a dining room, the stable block has a 24 hour security guard, the jockey's accommodation has a sauna, and the racetrack has new safety railings, and water points to keep the going soft. Racecourse employees include{valets}to look after the jockeys'{colours}and saddles and{treaders-in,}who replace the divets after each race.
